abstract: Roman Catholic Archdiocese of St Paul and Minneapolis files for bankruptcy in light of clergy sex abuse claims.
lead_paragraph: The Roman Catholic Archdiocese of St. Paul and Minneapolis filed for bankruptcy protection on Friday, saying it is the best way for the church to get as many resources as possible to victims of clergy sexual abuse.
snippet: The Roman Catholic Archdiocese of St. Paul and Minneapolis filed for bankruptcy protection on Friday, saying it is the best way for the church to get as many resources as possible to victims of clergy sexual abuse.

headline.main: Minnesota: Catholic Archdiocese Files for Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: Catholic Archdiocese Files for Bankruptcy
